title: Cyrillic Fest 2008
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011205im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sviato_logo_transparent_5845.gif)

„Свято Кирилиці” („Cyrillic Fest”) is a typography and calligraphy festival, which traditionally takes place in 24-25 May in Kharkiv (Ukraine). This year it included type seminars and presentation by [Vitalij Mitchenko’s book](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011205/http:/typophile.com/node/44376), type games and exhibition of typefaces and calligraphy from Ukraine, Russia, Belarus and Bulgaria.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011205im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/IMG_1629_cut_4472.jpg)
